title: [格式错误]eglow的配置报错
author: 我觉得很淦
txt_content:
装了一个eglow插件
[非完全]按照帖子的汉化文本

Messages:
  #General
  prefix: "&6[&B闪光&6]"
  noPermission: " &c你木有权限哦!"
  
  #Command
  #Glow
  startGlow: " &a你开始发光了!发的是&e%color%&a的光!"
  glowDisable: " &c您已禁用闪光!"
  glowEnable: " &a您已启用发光!"
  #GlowOther
  otherGlowConfirm: " &e%target%&a开始发光了!发的是&e%color%&a的光!"
  otherGlowConfirmOff: " &e%target% &c不发光了."
  otherGlowNotification: " &a你开始发光了,发的是 &e%color% &a的光!"
  otherGlowNotificationOff: "&a你不发光了."
  otherGlowDisabledWorld: " &c这个玩家所处的世界不准他发光的说!" 
  #Admin
  reloadConfirm: "&4乌拉!重载配置!"
  reloadWorldDisabled: "&c这个世界现在不准你发光了!所以你的发光已被隐藏!"
  #Invalid/Missing arguments
  invalidArgument: "&c错误!无效的参数!"
  incorrectUsage: "&c错误!请好好看看帮助!"
  noLastColor: "&c你上次没设置颜色的说."
  playerNotFound: "&c没找到这个玩家的说."
  invalidSpeedArgument: "&c你这输的什么东西..慢是slow,快是fast的说."
  missingSpeedArgument: "&c你没指定速度的说."
  missingColorArgument: "&c你没指定颜色的说."
  invalidPlayerArgument: "&c没找到这个玩家的说."
  missingPlayerArgument: "&c你没指定玩家的说."
  #Blacklisted World
  disabledInWorld: "&c这个世界不准你发光的说!"
  joinDisabledWorld: "&c你不发光了!因为这个世界不准你发光!"
  #Wrong command
  listCommands: "&9使用&e/eGlow help&9来查阅帮助吧!"
  #EasterEgg
  easterEgg: "&e好像我不会告诉任何人…但你真的试过吗?"
GUI:
  textTitle: "&闪光设置"
  0guiEffectUpdate: "&a发光效果被更新了的说"
  #Colors
  colorRed: "&c艳丽红"
  colorDarkRed: "&4中国红"
  colorGold: "&6闪耀金"
  colorYellow: "&e疑车无据黄"
  colorGreen: "&a原谅绿"
  colorDarkGreen: "&2资深原谅绿"
  colorAqua: "&b碧霄蓝"
  colorDarkAqua: "&3海之蓝"
  colorBlue: "&9百度蓝"
  colorDarkBlue: "&1苍穹蓝"
  colorPurple: "&5紫罗兰"
  colorPink: "&d少女粉"
  colorWhite: "&f纯净白"
  colorGray: "&7深空灰"
  colorDarkGray: "&8深邃灰"
  colorBlack: "&8神秘黑"
  
  #ColorText
  textColorPerm: "&9可以使用: "
  textBlinkPerm: "&9可以闪烁: "
  textActivate: "&9点击我,开始发光吧~"
  textYes: "&a可以"
  textNo: "&c不行"
  
  #SettingsText
  textYourSettings: "&9你的设置"
  textGlowOnJoin: "&9加入时发光:"
  textActiveOnQuit: "&9退出时激活:"
  textTrue: "&a是"
  textFalse: "&c否"
  textLastColorType: "&9上次的颜色/效果:"
  textToggleGlowOnJoin: "&9想在加入时发光吗?点击以切换!"
  
  #GlowingText
  textGlowingStatus: "&9发光状态"
  textGlowing: "&9发光:"
  textEnabled: "&a启用"
  textDisabled: "&c禁用"
  textClickToToggle: "&9点击以切换!"
  
  #EffectTypeText
  textEffectType: "&9效果类型"
  textSolid: "持续"
  textBlink: "闪烁"
  textBlinking: "闪烁"
  textRainbow: "彩虹"
  textRightClick: "右键: "
  textColorSelected: "&9"
  textColorUnselected: "&8"
  textClickToCycle: "&9点击以选中!"
  textSelectColor: "&c首先选择颜色吧!"
  textEnableGlow: "&c首先开始发光吧!"
  
  #EffectSpeed
  textEffectSpeed: "&9效果速度"
  textSpeed: "&9速度:"
  textSlow: "&c慢"
  textFast: "&a快"
  textEnableBlinkRainbow: "&c首先启用闪烁/彩虹吧!"
  textClickToChange: "&9点击以切换!"

提示

[12:44:55 WARN]: org.bukkit.configuration.InvalidConfigurationException: while parsing a block mapping

我想我也没什么错误啊
